aws_api_gateway_base_path_mapping.description: Connects a custom domain with a deployed API

domain_name.description: The already-registered domain name to connect the API to.

api_id.description: The id of the API to connect.

stage_name.description: The name of a specific deployment stage to expose at the given path. If omitted, callers may select any stage by including its name as a path element after the base path.

base_path.description: Path segment that must be prepended to the path when accessing the API via this mapping. If omitted, the API is exposed at the root of the given domain.
